text:
Re: <https://uncorkedstudios.atlassian.net/browse/MLC-109>
Testing out now. I'm not sure about the exact steps to get this crash, but I did notice that if I go through the onboarding screens, straight into the home screen, without exiting the app, then press the back button, it goes to the third gatekeeper screen. This seems like it could be related (based on the note, "live case crashed when setting a button action."). I'll keep testing...
thanks midori! yeah its seems like a weird one - let me know if you want me to try to test something on my end later
